    • fill

      public void fill()
      fills the board with new cards taken from the bag, and sets border-cards' state to PICKABLE, otherwise to NOT_PICKABLE

    • seeCardAtCoordinates

      public Card seeCardAtCoordinates(Coordinates coordinates)
      is an observer method
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of the card you want to see
      Returns:
      null if no card is found at those coordinates or the coordinates are invalid

    • getCardAtCoordinates

      public Card getCardAtCoordinates(Coordinates coordinates)
      this method allows to get a card from the board
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of the card you want to get
      Returns:
      null if no card is found at the coordinates provided or those are invalid or the card is NOT_PICKABLE. The actual card otherwise

      public boolean refillCheck()
      checks whether the board needs to be refilled
